frmMain.txtIntroMusic: Intro Music (If blank music from Intro will be used, or no sound if use Intro picture)
frmMain.txtEndCardMusic: EndCard Music (If blank music from EndCard will be used, or no sound if use EndCard picture)
frmMain.txtKaraokeOP: OP Karaoke Subtitle (For separated Karaoke file from main subtitle)
frmMain.txtKaraokeED: ED Karaoke Subtitle (For separated Karaoke file from main subtitle)
frmMain.cboVideoEncoder:
Choose video encoder
H.264 is compatible with any device
HEVC give smaller size with the same quality as H.264 but not any device is supported
frmMain.cboVideoRaw: Choose the corrected Raw source to match the subtitle with video as same as show in Aegisub
frmMain.tbVideo:
Choose video quality, will affect file size
H.264 and HEVC not use the same value please see the recommend value
frmMain.cboVideoPreset:
The speed of encoder, will affect file size and quality
Recommend to use Medium
frmMain.cboVideoRemover:
Remove noise in video, give very good result but in return encode time will be longer
Can't be used with GPU encoder
frmMain.tbVideoLineDarkener: Make the line darker, best for Anime
frmMain.tbVideoWarpSharp: Make the line slimmer, best for Anime
frmMain.cboVideoSmooth: 60FPS frame interpolation give smoother video but in return encode time will be longer
frmMain.cboColorDebanding: Remove color banding that happend with an old Anime file
frmMain.cboAudioFormat:
Audio Encoder
AAC for TV Anime
FLAC for Blu-Ray Anime
frmMain.cboAudioQuality:
The AAC audio quality
FLAC is not need, because it's lossless format
frmMain.txtIntroTransitionOverlay: Choose Custom Overlay Transition for Intro (Optional)
frmMain.txtEndCardTransitionOverlay: Choose Custom Overlay Transition for EndCard (Optional)
frmMain.cboLogoBlend: Choose Blend mode for Logo insertion
frmMain.txtOutput: Choose the save location for output file
